function isoxyd(x, y) local st = enigma.GetStone(x, y) if (st ~= nil) and (enigma.GetKind(st) == "st-oxyd") then return 1 else return 0 end end
function oxyd_Clear(x, y) if (isoxyd(x, y) == 0) or (CLEAR_OXYD == 1) then enigma.KillStone(x,y) end enigma.KillItem(x,y) end
function clearLevel(w, h) for y = 0, (h or level_height) - 1 do for x = 0, (w or level_width) - 1 do oxyd_Clear(x, y) end end end
function clearLevelExcept(w, h, ex, ey) for y = 0, (h or level_height) - 1 do for x = 0, (w or level_width) - 1 do if (x == ex) and (y == ey) then else oxyd_Clear(x, y) end end end end
